OrgName: NB Ventures, Inc., d/b/a GEP (Global eProcure)
activities:
To the extent any information collected by GEP is deemed to be Personal Data (as set forth by the European Commission’s Directive on Data Protection), personal name information is kept secure.  Sensitive information like passwords are encrypted.  
All of the data security is maintained by access rights segregation:
•	Users who have access to the data do not have access to administer the server.
•	Users who administer the server do not have access to the data.
The encryption keys are stored within the SQL server. This ensures a 2 step authentication to access the keys. (1.Windows login and 2. SQL server login)

Data is encrypted during:
•	Transmission via HTTPS protocol using a 128 bit encryption.
•	Back-up tapes – Using Symantec encryption keys.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Individual personal names.  Such names are only associated with business information (e.g. business address), and is not associated with any other personal data (e.g. home address).
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association, International Centre for Dispute Resolution
